entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.0°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle becoming mixed with drizzle late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
